summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Matrix News app new features: profile dropdown, saved articles system, and settings page functionality

minor_issues.issue: Rate limiting test returning 520 errors instead of 429
Returning 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Still blocks unauthorized access correctly, just different status code

passed_tests: Profile dropdown shows all 5 required items (Mes articles, Créer article, Sauvegardes, Paramètres, Déconnexion)
Settings page displays all profile form fields (username, email, phone, country, address, bio, avatar_url)
Settings page displays password change form (current_password, new_password, confirm_password)
Bookmark buttons visible and clickable on article cards
Saved articles page showing saved articles correctly
Protected routes /sauvegardes and /parametres redirect to /connexion when not authenticated
Bookmark buttons hidden when not authenticated
